level.text: The provisions of this chapter establish rules of organization and procedure for the Real Property Tax Appeals Commission for the District of Columbia (“Commission”), in accordance with the provisions of D.C. Official Code § 47-825.01a(b)(2) (2012 Supp.).

level.heading: SOURCE
level.text: Final Rulemaking published at 45 DCR 24 (January 2, 1998); as amended by Final Rulemaking published at 60 DCR 9888 (July 5, 2013).
